game.name: A Long Time Ago
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Long Time Ago is a 3D RPG, Adventure, Mystery game. A terrible accident happened and ever since you cannot wake up or even remember who you are.You will have to search deep inside your subconscious where all the truth about who you are is hidden and become who you used to be.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Long Time Ago is a 3D RPG, Adventure, Mystery game. A terrible accident happened and ever since you cannot wake up or even remember who you are.You will have to search deep inside your subconscious where all the truth about who you are is hidden and become who you used to be.
